EmailTemplate.name: 17.AMS.SmallCell.none.N.G.N.17207.Small Cells Campaign 2017.Email blast - Openin
EmailTemplate.subject: Turn urban data traffic into reliable revenue
EmailTemplate.textOnly: ${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Small cells: the quick and easy way to densify urban networks Urban mobile broadband demand is soaring. The revenue opportunity is simply too good to miss. Capture it with small cells. Low cost and easy to deploy, small cells put capacity and coverage precisely where it’s needed, indoors and outdoors. Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
